StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEventPlanPersonVisibility]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@EventId uniqueidentifier AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT epv.ID, epv.EventID, RTrim(rp.Rank_Code) + ' ' + RTrim(p.Last_Name) + ' ' + RTrim(p.First_Name) + ' ' + RTrim(p.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME) as DisplayName, rp.rowguid as RecruiterID FROM USMC.vwMcrissRecrui.ngPerson rp, USMC.vwMcrissPerson p, USMC.EventPlanPersonVisibility epv where rp.Recrui.ng_Person_ID = p.Person_ID AND rp.rowguid = epv.Recrui.ngPersonId AND EventId = @EventId ORDER BY DisplayName
END
